replies.body: Honestly in the current state of the game you can do anything you want, aside from obvious troll shit such as AD Vinager {{champion:45}}
i can imagine garen would also work especially with the silence

> [{quoted}](name=MunchCrunchLunch,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ZFAbs8lK,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-01-24T08:44:05.045+0000)
>
> i can imagine garen would also work especially with the silence

I used to go Garen mid in S3/S4, worked well for me. Not sure how well it goes after the changes. Although did go full armor Nasus mid vs a Zed recently and it worked out.

{{champion:122}} destroys any melee squishy with ease. Though it's very possible for him to get destroyed by {{champion:238}} {{champion:91}} {{champion:157}} .

I made the mistake of trading with {{champion:157}} pre level 6, his criticals and Q spam destroyed me.
Lost mid to a Zed that rushed an arpen build, safely farmed and dived me at level 6, blew me up.
Of course this was all early game, as mid game rolled around, I destroyed them.
On occasion, I've been down 2 turrets without taking 1 of theirs due to diving them pre6, not realizing the damage they put out trumps your bleed damage ten fold.

As for {{champion:91}} , that's purely a skill matchup. I've never lost to Darius as Talon and I've never lost to Talon as Darius.

I've done the same with Renekton and Irelia.

It's a glorious feeling.
